title: Fidelis Cybersecurity Earns PCI Forensic Investigator Certification to Fight Credit Card Thefts
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 7:30 AM   Fidelis Cybersecurity 
WALTHAM, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Fidelis Cybersecurity , the leading provider of products and services for detecting and stopping advanced cyber attacks, has been approved as a PCI Forensic Investigator (PFI) by the Payment Card Industry Security Standards Council (PCI SSC). The company’s consulting services group, comprised of the industry’s top incident response and forensic experts, have met the qualifications to assess and validate an organization’s adherence to the PCI DSS. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151009005598/en/ 
To gain approval as a PCI Forensic Investigator, Fidelis demonstrated their broad expertise in conducting forensic investigations for the financial services industry. The company validated their deep alignment with law enforcement agencies in pursuing criminal investigations. As a result, Fidelis is now on a select list of global forensic investigation firms that payment companies are required to use when compromised. 
“The threat of a data breach is a business reality, particularly as malicious actors have become tenacious, skilled and highly motivated to steal data,” said Michael Buratowski, vice president of consulting services at Fidelis Cybersecurity. “The PCI Forensic Investigator certification allows us to engage with payment card companies immediately following an attack to quickly detect, investigate and stop the theft of critical information.” 
Fidelis consulting services offers a comprehensive portfolio ranging from incident response to proactive security assessments that help organizations prepare for and respond to security incidents. Our team of incident response experts enables organizations to leverage our proprietary threat intelligence, network and endpoint technology to successfully identify vulnerabilities, detect and respond to breaches and improve incident response capabilities and security programs. 
Learn more about Fidelis Consulting Services here . 
About Fidelis Cybersecurity 
Fidelis Cybersecurity protects the world’s most sensitive data by equipping organizations to detect, investigate and stop advanced cyber attacks. Our products, services and proprietary threat intelligence enable customers to proactively face advanced threats and prevent data theft with immediate detection, monitoring and response capabilities. With our Fidelis XPS and Resolution1 Endpoint, customers can get one step ahead of any attacker before a major breach hits. To learn more about Fidelis Cybersecurity, please visit www.fidelissecurity.com and follow us on Twitter @FidSecSys .
